com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.fx
Class Fx

java.lang.Object
  com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.util.Observable
      com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.fx.Fx
Direct Known Subclasses:
FxStyle, FxStyles
public class Fx
extends Observable

Base class for animation effects.

This code is based on code from the MooTools Project by Valerio Proietti.

Events:
EffectStart : FxEvent(fx)
Fires after an effect is started.
  • fx : this
EffecCancel : FxEvent(fx)
Fires after an effect has been cancelled.
  • fx : this
EffecComplete : FxEvent(fx)
Fires after an effect has been completed
  • fx : this
This class is partially based on the Fx package in the MooTools framework, see http://mootools.net.

Field Summary
 int duration
          The duration of the effect in ms.
 int fps
          The frames per second for the transition.
 boolean hideOnComplete
          true to hide the element after the effect using the css 'display' attribute.
 Transition transition
          The effect transition.
 boolean wait
          To wait or not to wait for a current transition to end before running another of the same instance.

Field Detail

duration

public int duration
The duration of the effect in ms. Default value is 500.

fps

public int fps
The frames per second for the transition. Default is 50.

wait

public boolean wait
To wait or not to wait for a current transition to end before running another of the same instance. Default value is true.

transition

public Transition transition
The effect transition. Default values is Transition.LINEAR;

hideOnComplete

public boolean hideOnComplete
true to hide the element after the effect using the css 'display' attribute.
